title: Here are the new per-app language settings in Android 13 [Gallery]
content:
One expected new feature in Android 13 is the ability to set languages on a per-app basis, instead of globally for the device as a whole. While that feature isn’t live by default in the first developer preview, we’ve been able to take a look at it.

more…

The post Here are the new per-app language settings in Android 13 [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android 13 is adding support for apps to support different languages, and we've got a look at the functionality ahead of release.
